author: Melissa Locker
title: Tom Hanks, Rachel Bloom and Stephen Colbert Pay Tribute to Fountains of Wayne’s Adam Schlesinger
description: Tom Hanks pays tribute to the singer and songwriter who died of complications from the coronavirus.
content:
Tributes are pouring in for Fountains of Wayne band member Adam Schlesinger who died on Wednesday due to complications from the novel coronavirus.
While Schlesinger rose to fame in the ’90s with the alternative pop band, his creativity could not be contained… [+2376 chars]
